metadata.synopsis: The execution scene in Moonrise just finished where the player would have witnessed Ketheric taking a spear and walking it off. Daisy will want to tell the player to push for more information and find the source of his powers (Nightsong).
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load SCL_Main_Agoto -152; 23; -193Complete the execution dialog (without attacking Ketheric/Z'rell)

2.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
2.text: The seat of the Absolute's power - occupied by a General that cannot be killed. But his followers are flesh and blood.

0.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
0.text: We must learn what fuels his power.

1.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
1.text: We must learn more about his power.
